class_notes: This class counts as Quantitative & Methodological (QM), or Specified Depth, or  Other Depth, or Elective for the BS; Depth Course or Elective for the BA.
course_description: In an unprecedented advance, we've engineered cognitive systems that stand toe-to-toe with human intellectual capabilities. This pivotal achievement is set to revolutionize human psychology. Leading this revolution will be computational techniques that enhance our ability to analyze the human mind.
prerequisites: QTM 100 or QTM_OX 100 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: TTh 8:30am-9:45am in New Psyc Bldg 290 (36 Eagle Ro
